Content.Text:
<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh. Good day, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
I was just inspecting my crops.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I've found it rather rewarding to watch my crops
and livestock grow.
<PAGE>
It's strange. Not long ago, it hadn't even
occurred to me that I might enjoy these sorts of
things.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh! That reminds me. There is someone I would
like you to meet.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Who? Ohoho! You will see in a moment. Come
with me.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Here. I wanted you to meet...her.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is the first cow whose birth I witnessed
myself.
<PAGE>
I had decided on a whim to peek into the barn
just as she was being born.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>It was simple curiosity at first, but I soon found I
couldn't look away. In the end, I stayed for all of
it.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_R>That was the moment I realized...even though
they aren't human, each of these animals has its
own special life.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Obviously, I already knew that in my head...
<PAGE>
But it was the moment of her birth that I first
came to feel it was true in my heart.
<PAGE>
I think I'm starting to see things differently. Of
course, I have a long way to go, but...still.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Since I "happened" to walk in at the moment of
her birth, it feels only right that I should be the
one to take care of her.
<PAGE>
It's far from easy, and there are still so many
things I don't understand, but I'll be the best
caregiver I can be.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm very thankful to you.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If you hadn't challenged me to change my
perspective, I wouldn't have witnessed this little
one's birth.
<PAGE>
In fact, I never would have gone near the barn in
the first place.
<PAGE>
And I wouldn't have come to care for her so
much...

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<WINDOW_QUESTION_R>Wha?! Wh-what's wrong? Does something hurt?
Oh, you poor thing! Wh-what do I do? This
hasn't ever happened before!
Give the cow medicine.
Stand back and watch.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, what was that you did?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
O-oh...I see. When an animal isn't feeling well,
you give them that medicine.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Are you okay now? Has it stopped hurting?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
That's good.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm very glad you happened to be here,
<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>If I'd been by myself, I'm sure I would have
succumbed to panic and done nothing.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Thank you.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_R>Truly, you are such a reliable person. It makes
me even more enthralled with you---

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
AHEM! Never mind that. I said nothing. Nothing,
you hear?!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>A-anyway! Thank you for your help. Now if you
don't mind, I need to discover what it is that
made my cow sick.
<PAGE>
You may leave for today. Goodbye!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Ah well...I had thought I might be able to say it
today, but it's so hard to get the words out.
Sometimes, I irritate myself.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
After you had given me the perfect chance, too.
I'm sorry you have such a foolish caregiver...

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
W-wait right there! I'll go call somebody to help.
<MYNAME>, please watch over her!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Goodness. Who would've thought her illness
was due to overeating? So animals can fall sick
from that, too. How surprising.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
She's been given medicine, so she should be all
right. But they said to let her rest for today.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD><MYNAME>...? Did you happen to have some
medicine with you?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I thought you would have. It would be hard to
believe a farmer of your caliber wouldn't have
any handy.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGRY>Then why didn't you give it to her right away?
She was in terrible pain, and you were right
there!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You forgot you had it?!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGRY>I see. I know I shouldn't say anything, as I
couldn't help her myself...
<PAGE>
But I fail to see how medicine is of any use to
you if you forget you have it!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
No, I should apologize. Being angry at you
doesn't fix anything.
<PAGE>
The true culprit is my own ignorance. That's
what I should be upset about.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I am going to go and re-read my books on
livestock care.
<PAGE>
You may go home for the day, <MYNAME>.
Good day.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I shouldn't be relying on <MYNAME> for every
little thing.
<PAGE>
That cow belongs to me, after all. I must be
more responsible for her care.
